title: Value of a definite integral using substitution

content.prompt: Let f be a function such that ∫ 6 12 f ( 2x )dx=10 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4388@ . Which of the following must be true?

choices.label: ∫ 12 24 f ( t )dt=5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42C8@

∫ 12 24 f ( t ) d t = 20 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42C8@

∫ 6 12 f ( t )dt=5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@420E@

∫ 6 12 f ( t ) d t = 20 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@420E@

∫ 3 6 f ( t )dt=5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4154@

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
